title: Bank of Canada Leaves Key Interest Rate Unchanged at 0.25%
sub_head: Central bank raises concerns about the potential impacts of recent flooding and the Omicron variant
body:
OTTAWA—The Bank of Canada kept its benchmark overnight interest rate on hold and its forward guidance unchanged, even as it warned that the Omicron variant of Covid-19 had introduced more uncertainty into the country’s economic recovery.
Analysts said the tone of the central bank’s statement on Wednesday was generally neutral, leaving many anticipating that a first interest-rate increase will likely take place in April.
The...
